{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15825v1", "title": "Bounce Cosmologies in Generalized Coupling Theories", "summary": "We describe an exact solution representing a bouncing cosmology in the
Minimal Exponential Measure (MEMe) model. Such a solution, obtained by means of
the linearization around small values of the characteristic energy scale q of
the theory, has the peculiarity of representing a complete bounce model that
can be used to explore quantitative processes in non-singular cosmologies.", "main_category": "gr-qc", "categories": "gr-qc,astro-ph.CO", "published": "2025-04-22T12:14:32Z"}
